import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { Recipe } from '../recipe.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-recipe-list', templateUrl: './recipe-list.component.html', styleUrls: ['./recipe-list.component.css'] }) export class RecipesListComponent implements OnInit { recipes: Recipe[] = [ new Recipe('A Test Recipe','This is simply a test','https://www.cnet.com/a/img/resize/69256d2623afcbaa911f08edc45fb2d3f6a8e172/hub/2023/02/03/afedd3ee-671d-4189-bf39-4f312248fb27/gettyimages-1042132904.jpg?auto=webp&fit=crop&height=675&width=1200'), new Recipe('A Test Recipe','This is simply a test','https://www.cnet.com/a/img/resize/69256d2623afcbaa911f08edc45fb2d3f6a8e172/hub/2023/02/03/afedd3ee-671d-4189-bf39-4f312248fb27/gettyimages-1042132904.jpg?auto=webp&fit=crop&height=675&width=1200') ]; constructor() { } ngOnInit() { } }

{{ recipe.name }}

{{ recipe.description }}
